filmography.title: Cinderella
filmography.role_description: The classic fairy tale heroine, played by Pickford in one of her earliest feature-length successes.
filmography.plot: Mistreated by her stepmother and stepsisters, a girl gets a chance to attend the royal ball with the help of a fairy godmother.

filmography.title: Tess of the Storm Country
filmography.role_description: A squatter's daughter who fights to protect her community and a wealthy man's illegitimate child; the role that cemented her stardom.
filmography.plot: A squatter's daughter tries to save a wealthy man's illegitimate child while fighting for her father's rights.

filmography.title: The Poor Little Rich Girl
filmography.role_description: A lonely wealthy child who is ignored by her parents and neglected by servants, leading to a tragic crisis.
filmography.plot: A rich girl ignored by her parents creates her own fantasy world, but tragedy strikes when she is given an overdose of medicine.

filmography.title: A Romance of the Redwoods
filmography.role_description: A naive New England girl who travels to the California Gold Rush and falls for a road agent.
filmography.plot: A young woman travels to the California Gold Rush to live with her uncle, only to find he has been killed by Indians.

filmography.title: The Little American
filmography.role_description: An American girl caught in Europe at the outbreak of WWI who witnesses the horrors of the conflict.
filmography.plot: An American woman traveling to France gets caught up in the German invasion during World War I.

filmography.title: Rebecca of Sunnybrook Farm
filmography.role_description: A spirited young girl sent to live with her strict aunts, winning them over with her irrepressible charm.
filmography.plot: A young girl is sent to live with her two strict aunts, where her cheerful spirit transforms their lives.

filmography.title: The Little Princess
filmography.role_description: A wealthy girl in a boarding school who becomes a servant when her father is reported dead, but never loses her spirit.
filmography.plot: A young girl is relegated to servitude at a boarding school when her father goes missing and her fortune is lost.

filmography.title: Stella Maris
filmography.role_description: A tour-de-force dual role playing both a paralyzed, sheltered beauty and a homely, abused orphan.
filmography.plot: A beautiful invalid and an ugly orphan girl both fall in love with the same man, with tragic consequences.

filmography.title: M'Liss
filmography.role_description: A wild mountain girl who inherits a fortune but must fight off those who want to steal it.
filmography.plot: A wild mountain girl tries to protect her inheritance from a group of swindlers in the West.

filmography.title: Daddy-Long-Legs
filmography.role_description: An orphan whose college education is sponsored by a mysterious benefactor she nicknames Daddy-Long-Legs.
filmography.plot: A wealthy benefactor sends an orphan to college, keeping his identity secret, while she writes him letters and falls in love with him.

filmography.title: Heart o' the Hills
filmography.role_description: A Kentucky mountain girl who seeks revenge for her father's murder while defending her land.
filmography.plot: A young mountain girl seeks justice for her father's death and fights against land grabbers.

filmography.title: Pollyanna
filmography.role_description: The eternally optimistic 'Glad Girl' who transforms a bitter town with her positive attitude; one of her defining roles.
filmography.plot: An orphan girl brings optimism and joy to her stern aunt and the cynical townspeople she lives with.

filmography.title: Suds
filmography.role_description: A lonely London laundress who spins a fantasy romance to impress her coworkers and escape her drudgery.
filmography.plot: A washerwoman fantasizes about a romance with a handsome customer to escape her lonely reality.

filmography.title: The Love Light
filmography.role_description: An Italian lighthouse keeper who unwittingly harbors a German spy during WWI, leading to tragedy.
filmography.plot: An Italian lighthouse keeper falls in love with a man she rescues from the sea, unaware he is a German spy.

filmography.title: Through the Back Door
filmography.role_description: A Belgian refugee who is brought to America and works as a maid in her own mother's house without revealing her identity.
filmography.plot: A Belgian girl is sent to America for safety and ends up working as a maid for her wealthy mother who doesn't recognize her.

filmography.title: Little Lord Fauntleroy
filmography.role_description: A dual role as the American boy who inherits a British earldom and his loving mother.
filmography.plot: An American boy discovers he is the heir to a British fortune and goes to live with his grumpy grandfather.

filmography.title: Tess of the Storm Country
filmography.role_description: A remake of her 1914 hit with higher production values, reaffirming her status as the world's most popular actress.
filmography.plot: A squatter's daughter tries to save a wealthy man's illegitimate child while fighting for her father's rights.

filmography.title: Rosita
filmography.role_description: A street singer in Spain who catches the eye of the King, leading to court intrigue and romance.
filmography.plot: A Spanish street singer attracts the attention of the King, but she loves a nobleman who is condemned to die.

filmography.title: Dorothy Vernon of Haddon Hall
filmography.role_description: A headstrong Elizabethan noblewoman who defies her father to marry the man she loves.
filmography.plot: In Elizabethan England, a noblewoman refuses an arranged marriage to pursue the man she truly loves.

filmography.title: Little Annie Rooney
filmography.role_description: A tough slum kid who tries to clear her brother's name after he is accused of murder.
filmography.plot: The daughter of a policeman tries to prove her brother's innocence when he is accused of shooting a man.

filmography.title: Sparrows
filmography.role_description: The courageous eldest orphan on a 'baby farm' in the swamps who leads the younger children to safety.
filmography.plot: A teenage girl tries to protect a group of younger orphans from their cruel master in a swamp-bound baby farm.

filmography.title: My Best Girl
filmography.role_description: A stockroom girl who falls for the store owner's son, thinking he is just a fellow employee.
filmography.plot: A shopgirl falls in love with her co-worker, unaware that he is actually the son of the store's wealthy owner.

filmography.title: Coquette
filmography.role_description: A flirtatious Southern belle whose dalliances lead to tragedy for her father and lover; Pickford's first talkie.
filmography.plot: A Southern belle's flirtatious nature leads to a conflict between her father and the man she loves, resulting in a trial.

filmography.title: The Taming of the Shrew
filmography.role_description: The shrewish Katherina who engages in a battle of wills with her husband Petruchio in Shakespeare's comedy.
filmography.plot: Ideally suited for each other, Petruchio and Katherina nonetheless tear through their marriage in a battle of wills.
filmography.awards: First Sound Film with Douglas Fairbanks

filmography.title: Secrets
filmography.role_description: A woman who reflects on her long, tumultuous marriage to a pioneer husband; Pickford's final film role.
filmography.plot: An elderly woman recounts her life story, from eloping to the American West to building a fortune with her husband.
